mapper.select: SELECT p.MEMBERSEQ , n.EMAIL, NICKNAME , NVL(INTRODUCE, 0) INTRODUCE , PHONE , BIRTHDAY , GENDER , AUTH , USERSTATUS , NVL(MENTORTIER, 0) MENTORTIER, LOGINCNT , REPORTCNT, JOINDATE , MENTEECNT , MENTEEACCSTAR, NVL(BYEBYE,0) BYEBYE, NVL(MAJOR,0) MAJOR, NVL(SCHOOL,0) SCHOOL, NVL(CAREER,0) CAREER, NVL(CERTIFICATE,0) CERTIFICATE, NVL(SPECIALFIELD,0) SPECIALFIELD, TO_DATE(NVL(PMDATE, '21201231'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') PMDATE, MENTORCNT, MENTOACCSTAR, FILECHK, NVL(PHOTO,0) PHOTO FROM NAEMEMBER n JOIN PROFILE p ON n.MEMBERSEQ = p.MEMBERSEQ AND n.MEMBERSEQ = #{memberseq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACHFILE (FILESEQ, USERFILE, SEARCHFILE, FILESIZE, UPLOADDATE, FILEPATH, ADMINSEQ, MEMBERSEQ) VALUES(FILESEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userfile}, #{searchfile}, #{filesize}, SYSDATE, #{filepath}, '0', #{memberseq})
mapper.update: UPDATE NAEMEMBER SET AUTH = 'ROLE_R' WHERE MEMBERSEQ = #{memberseq}
